metadata.name: Redemption Heights
metadata.description: Welcome to Redemption Heights, the home and base of operations for the beings charged with collecting the souls of humanity. One such collector is Dana, a dark angel of death. When a collector called David is sent to spy on the residents of Redemption Heights, He is brutally murdered and all signs point to Dana. She must prove her innocence and expose a conspiracy that will rock the foundations of Redemption Heights and bring two millennia of the collectors to an end.
